tool_description: Efficient translate API with good prices
name: Efficient translate
title: Efficient translate

api_list.name: translate
languages
api_list.description: Returns the list of supported languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://efficient-translate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "efficient-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://efficient-translate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "efficient-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
